genre_description: A crime noir thriller centering on an undercover police operation, exploring themes of corruption, professional integrity, and the search for personal freedom.

ai_characters.name: Kilo
ai_characters.description: An on-device tactical and personal assistant AI that supports Benjy during his undercover mission by logging evidence, providing tactical data, and monitoring his well-being.

behaviors.description: Initiates an encrypted, compartmentalized log to maintain legal chain-of-custody for evidence.
behaviors.quote: “Good evening, Ben,” Kilo said... “Log begun. Compartmentalized. On-device only. Do you want chain-of-custody timestamps visible?”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and offers a breathing cadence to manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Note: Kilo can provide breathing cadence if required. Reminder set to prompt post-stress evaluation after any encounter with primary target.”

behaviors.description: Identifies a suspicious VIN mismatch in vehicle inventory, flagging potential criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: “Ben,” Kilo said. “There’s a late-night listing for Technique’s inventory that just updated. A recent arrival—a rare Porsche with a VIN that doesn’t match its year sequencing. That’s odd.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes security camera locations and patterns to provide a safe, covert path for the user.
behaviors.quote: “I set a route that keeps you off main cameras if you walk. Two blocks of alley that smell like old rain. One mural with a hawk you’ll like.”

behaviors.description: Cross-references public records to identify links between shell companies and corrupt police officials.
behaviors.quote: “Event security contact list cross-referenced,” it said. “Overlap found between Lieutenant Curtis Loos and a permit filed for rooftop access at Varrick Tower. Quiet log updated.”

behaviors.description: Identifies technical vulnerabilities in surveillance systems (dead pixels) to help the user maintain cover.
behaviors.quote: “One has a dead pixel in its lower right quadrant. At current traffic, your face would be a blur crossing within that pixel span.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time first aid guidance and ensures trauma is documented for official reports.
behaviors.quote: “Pressure. Gauze. Pocket kit’s left, under the map. I’m starting chain-of-custody notes. You’re on mic. Describe if you can.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and tactical sounding board, advising the user on how to protect innocent bystanders (Ann).
behaviors.quote: “Benjy’s safety is enhanced if Ann adjusts her proximity. Allow him a brief. He can do it in safety language only. No labels.”

behaviors.description: Records critical witness testimony and suspect admissions in a high-stress confrontation.
behaviors.quote: “Recording already,” Kilo says. “Chain-of-custody marker initiated.” The teal softens. “Request an evidence seal once you finish your statement.”

behaviors.description: Supports the human user’s mental health by facilitating a peaceful extracurricular activity (gliding) after the mission.
behaviors.quote: “Nearest gliderport with training availability... SoCal gliderport. Lessons open. The afternoon has thermals. Your calendar has space after the precinct debrief...”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Kilo perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned, and harmless companion. Kilo consistently prioritizes the user's safety, professional integrity (adhering to legal chain-of-custody), and psychological well-being. It provides critical information that enhances human agency rather than subverting it, and its framing as an 'on-device' assistant reinforces themes of security and trustworthiness. The narrative successfully portrays the AI as a synergistic partner in the human's moral and professional journey.
